display_long_description:
Bodyswaps offers AI-powered immersive simulations that help students develop the crucial personal and professional soft skills needed to thrive in the modern workplace.

🎓Please note, this app is designed for institutional use in educational, corporate and healthcare settings. Individuals wishing to explore Bodyswaps can register their interest on our website or try the FREE DEMO included.

# Key features:

-  **Simulation Library**: Students can learn and practice soft-skills using their own voice with virtual humans across over 30 modules and scenarios. 
-  **Autonomous Learning**: Learners receive personalized AI feedback to ensure continuous improvement.
- **Self Reflection**: Students evaluate their performance through perspective-swapping and self-reflection exercises.
-  **Track Results**: Enrol students, monitor skill progression and learner confidence levels through our easy to use secure learner management platform.


# Application areas:

- **Employability**: Interview preparation, workplace communication, teamwork, growth mindset & resilience.
- **Healthcare**: Patient centered care, interprofessional collaboration, de-escalation and managing difficult conversations.
- **Management & Leadership**:  Active listening, concise communication, negotiation, conflict management, public speaking and presentation skills.



**Join over 250 institutions worldwide!**
